Articles.Content:
Space Shuttle Mission

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DIRxjchYHd4

Sped Up at Times

My first attempt at a recorded mission.

Mission Details:

Launch from KSC and rendezvous with satellite in low orbit.

Deploy Cargo, and remotely dock cargo with satellite.

Get satellite into higher orbit.

De-Orbit Shuttle and Land.
Er, did you record this with a camera? You know there is quite a bit of screen recording software. You should check out bandicam.
Shouldn't this be in the "Live from mission control" section? Either way, nice video! (It does start looking a bit wierd at times though, did you try to enhance it or something?)
There is a separate sub-forum for videos, which (Presto!) this thread now occupies.

Er, did you record this with a camera? You know there is quite a bit of screen recording software. You should check out bandicam.

Honestly I used quicktime because it came with my mac. But I will definitely check out bandicam! Thanks!

Shouldn't this be in the "Live from mission control" section? Either way, nice video! (It does start looking a bit wierd at times though, did you try to enhance it or something?)

Yea i realized that I posted in wrong section so I posted in the right one but then couldn't figure out how to delete this one lol. But thank you for watching anywayz. Ill record the next one with better software.
